fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Carry a message to another player. You steal feedback from your first target and give it to your second target. *Hey, get back here!*
- Prepare a Strike on a target. Strikes are announced the following morning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When targeting a Striked player, you learn their role.
- If two or more Striked players are alive, and you target a Striked player, your second target learns your first target's role.
- If two or more Striked players are alive, gain basic defense.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all who stand against the Town.
